sentences.sentence: We at five underneath orison of wreaths.
Success author Orison Swett Marden once wrote, the first part of success is get-to-it-ivness.
sentences.translation: 成功学作家Orison Swett Marden 曾写道，成功的第一部分是发现价值（get-to-it-ivness）。

sentences.sentence: And in him walk behind of day every day distracted, an orison of time he can be peaceful to return.
sentences.translation: 并且在他走后的日子里天天心神不定，一遍遍的祈祷他能够平安归来。
